reviewText: This is a collection of five previously released operas in their original DVD cases. The cases are housed in a thin cardboard box. Customer reviews of this box set can be found on Amazon's United Kingdom site at: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Britten-Collection-Various-OPUS-ARTE/dp/B014JD2KL0/ref=sr_1_1_twi_dvd_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1479841925&sr=8-1&keywords=britten+collection THE OPERAS ARE: *****PETER GRIMES (4.4 stars)***** John Graham-Hall is Peter Grimes in this excellent production from La Scala. This opera is available at: Peter Grimes IT IS ALSO AVAILABLE AT: Britten: Peter Grimes [John Graham-Hall, Francesco Malvuccio, Susan Gritton] [Opus Arte: OA1103D] [DVD] [2013] [NTSC] More customer reviews can be found on Amazon's United Kingdom site at: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Britten-Graham-Hall-Francesco-Malvuccio-Gritton/dp/B01M9IEQ7F/ref=sr_1_12_twi_dvd_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1479840797&sr=8-12&keywords=peter+grimes *****THE RAPE OF LUCRETIA (4.6 stars)***** This is another excellent production, this one from the English National Opera. This opera is available at: Britten: Rape of Lucretia More customer reviews can be found on Amazon's United Kingdom site at: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Britten-Lucretia-Connolly-Christopher-Maltman/dp/B00FFYJHJ6/ref=sr_1_2_twi_dvd_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1479840993&sr=8-2&keywords=THE+RAPE+OF+LUCRETIA *****BILLY BUDD (4.8 stars)***** This is a Glyndebourne Festival production, outstanding in every way. This opera is available at: Britten: Billy Budd More customer reviews can be found on Amazon's United Kingdom site at: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Britten-Billy-Budd-DVD/dp/B004UU31XE/ref=sr_1_8_twi_dvd_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1479841157&sr=8-8&keywords=billy+budd *****GLORIANA (3.5 stars)***** Susan Bullock as Queen Elizabeth I leads this Royal Opera House production. It has many fine qualities but falls short of Britten's grand vision. This opera is available at: Britten: Gloriana More customer reviews can be found on Amazon's United Kingdom site at: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Britten-Gloriana-Bullock-Patricia-OA1124D/dp/B00FFYJHY6/ref=sr_1_2_twi_dvd_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1479840445&sr=8-2&keywords=GLORIANA+dvd *****DEATH IN VENICE (4.7 stars)***** John Graham-Hall sings the lead part of Gustav von Aschenbach. The production is excellent, as is the singing and acting. This opera is available at: Britten: Death in Venice More customer reviews can be found on Amazon's United Kingdom site at: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Britten-Death-Venice-Graham-Hall-Andrew/dp/B00HXD7D70/ref=sr_1_5_twi_dvd_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1479841437&sr=8-5&keywords=DEATH+IN+VENICE
